content: Continue along the main narrow path and down some stairs until you see a large slab with a mural on it. Just to the right is a small alcove that holds a Snake-Head Mushroom you can harvest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Back Hills'.
The content is as follows:
Continue along the main narrow path and down some stairs until you see a large slab with a mural on it. Just to the right is a small alcove that holds a Snake-Head Mushroom you can harvest.
